_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: EGGS PM2 BY ReyOffc

installation.script:
apt update
apt install curl -y

mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

rm -rf .config
mkdir .config
mkdir .config/neofetch

curl -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ReyOffc/egg-pm2/cekilegg/README-egg-pm2 --output BY-ReyOffc
curl -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ReyOffc/egg-pm2/cekilegg/rizal.conf --output .config/neofetch/config.conf
